(Program
  (For
    (ExpressionStatement
      (Assignment
        (Identifier)
        (Float)))
    (ExpressionStatement
      (LessThan
        (Identifier)
        (Float)))
    (Update
      (Identifier))
    (
      (If
        (Equal
          (Identifier)
          (Float))
        (
          (Break
            (Empty)))
        (Empty))
      (Empty)
      (ExpressionStatement
        (Identifier)))))
